items.name: Foraged Salad
items.description: Made from whatever our Ranger found

items.name: Stuffed Eggs
items.description: Made in the style of the devil

items.name: Stew
items.description: With meat and vegetables, served in a trench

items.name: Sandwich
items.description: With roast meat in meat sauce

items.name: The Fancyman's Feast
items.description: Our finest meats, cheeses, fruits, and nuts. You must commit to marrying our eldest daughter.

items.name: The Commoner's Feast
items.description: Whatever's left of the Fancyman's Feast

items.name: Scones
items.description: Served warm with butter and jam

msg: As you would expect with all good medieval banquets, wine and ale are included with your meal!
warning: Menu may vary with the season
